Verses: 1 adhigaalame Yosuvaa Ezhundhirundhapinbu, Avanum Isravel Puththirar Anaivarum Siththeemilirundhu Pirayaanampanni, Yordhaan Mattum Vandhu, Adhaikkadandhu Pogumunne Ange Raaththanginaargal.
2 moondru Naal Sendrapinbu, Adhibadhigal Paalayam Engum Poi,

3 janangalai Nokki: Neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkaip Pettiyaiyum Adhaisumakkira Leviyaraagiya Aasaariyargalaiyum Kandavudane, Neengalum Ungal Idaththaivittup Pirayaanappattu, Adharkup Pinsellungal.

4 ungalukkum Adharkum Idaiyile Irandaayiram Muzhath Dhooramaana Idam Irukkavendum; Neengal Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyai Ariyumbadikku, Adharkuch Sameebamaai Varaadhiruppeergalaaga; Idharkumunne Neengal Orupodhum Indha Vazhiyaai Nadandhu Pogavillai Endru Solli Kattalaiyittaargal.
5 yosuvaa Janangalai Nokki: Ungalaip Parisuththampannikkollungal; Naalaikkukkarththar Ungal Naduvile Arpudhangalaich Seyvaar Endraan.

6 pinbu Yosuvaa Aasaariyargalai Nokki: Neengal Udanbadikkaippettiyai Eduththukkondu, Janangalukku Munne Nadandhu Pongal Endraan; Appadiye Udanbadikkaip Pettiyai Eduththukkondu Janangalukku Munne Ponaargal.
7 karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Naan Moseyode Irundhadhupola, Unnodum Irukkiren Enbadhai Isravelarellaarum Ariyumbadikku, Indru Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Unnai Menmaippaduththuven.
8 udanbadikkaip Pettiyaich Sumakkira Aasaariyaraip Paarththu: Neengal Yordhaan Thanneer Oraththil Serumbodhu, Yordhaanil Nillungal Endru Nee Kattalaiyiduvaayaaga Endraar.
9 yosuvaa Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Neengal Inge Serndhu, Ungal Dhevanaagiyakarththarudaiya Vaarththaigalaik Kelungal Endraan.

10 pinbu Yosuvaa: Jeevanulla Dhevan Ungal Naduvile Irukkiraar Enbadhaiyum, Avar Kaanaaniyaraiyum Eththiyaraiyum Eviyaraiyum Perisiyaraiyum Girgaasiyaraiyum Emoriyaraiyum Eboosiyaraiyum Ungalukku Munbaagath Thuraththividuvaar Enbadhaiyum, Neengal Arindhukolvadharku Adaiyaalamaaga:
11 idho, Sarva Boomikkum Aandavaraayirukkiravarudaiya Udanbadikkaippetti Ungalukku Munne Yordhaanile Pogiradhu.
12 ippozhudhum Isravel Koththirangalile Panniranduperai, Ovvoru Koththiraththukku Ovvoruvaraagap Piriththedungal.

13 sambavippadhu Ennavendraal, Sarvaboomikkum Aandavaraagiya Karththarinpettiyaisumakkira Aasaariyargalin Ullangaalgal Yordhaanin Thanneerile Pattamaaththiraththil, Meleyirundhu Odivarugira Yordhaanin Thanneer Odaamal Oru Kuviyalaaga Nirkum Endraan.
14 janangal Yordhaanaik Kadandhupogath Thangal Koodaarangalil Irundhu Purappattaargal; Aasaariyargal Udanbadikkaip Pettiyai Janangalukku Munne Sumandhu Kondupoi, Yordhaan Mattum Vandhaargal.
15 yordhaan Aruppukkaalam Muzhuvadhum Karaipurandupom. Pettiyaisumakkira Aasaariyargalin Kaalgal Thanneerin Oraththil Pattavudane,

16 meleyirundhu Odivarugira Thanneer Nindru Saardhaanukkaduththa Aadhaam Oorvaraikkum Oru Kuviyalaagak Kuvindhadhu; Uppukkadal Ennum Samanaana Veliyin Kadalukku Odivarugira Thanneer Pirindhu Oditru; Appozhudhu Janangal Erigovukku Edhire Kadandhu Ponaargal.

17 saagala Janangalum Yordhaanaikkaandhu Theerumalavum, Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkaip Pettiyaich Sumakkira Aasaariyargal Yordhaanin Naduvile Thanneerillaadha Tharaiyil Kaaloondri Nirkumbodhu, Isravelarellaarum Thanneeratra Ularndha Tharaivazhiyaaik Kadandhu Ponaargal.
